entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
